channel.title: Does this look like a correct set up for herblore

item.title: Does this look like a correct set up for herblore
item.dc:creator: @Ags_Rush Ags Rush
item.description:
@Ags_Rush wrote:

Just using unfinishes, and herbs. Does it look right? [Delta]

[code]package server.skills;

import server.client;

/**
*

  • @author Zach

*/

public class Herblore {

public static void itemOnItem(client c, int Item, int Item2) {
	
	/*
	 * Adding a potion to itself to increase the
	 * doses of one of them.
	 */
	
	/* 
	 * Rewrite in Java Tommorow
	 *  
	 * @date 12/12/2011
	 * @author Zach
	 * 
	 */
	
	/* Making Potions */
	
	if(Item == 249 && Item2 == 227 || Item == 227 && Item2 == 249) { // Attack Potion Unfinished
		c.addHerb(249, 227, 91, 309, 1);
	} else
	if(Item == 91 && Item2 == 221 || Item == 227 && Item2 == 221) { // Attack Potion Finished
		c.addHerb(91, 221, 121, 2303, 1);
	} else
	if(Item == 251 && Item2 == 227 || Item == 227 && Item2 == 251) { // Anti-Poison Unfinished
		c.addHerb(251, 227, 93, 356, 5);
	} else
	if(Item == 93 && Item2 == 235 || Item == 235 && Item2 == 93) { // Anti Poison Finished
		c.addHerb(93, 235, 175, 2543, 5);
	} else
	if(Item == 253 && Item2 == 227 || Item == 227 && Item2 == 253) { // Strength Potion Unfinished
		c.addHerb(253, 227, 95, 421, 12);
	} else
	if(Item == 95 && Item2 == 225 || Item == 225 && Item2 == 95) { // Strength Potion Finished
		c.addHerb(95, 225, 115, 3103, 12);
	} else
	if(Item == 255 && Item2 == 227 || Item == 227 && Item2 == 255) { // Restore Potion Unfinished
		c.addHerb(255, 227, 97, 518, 22);
	} else
	if(Item == 97 && Item2 == 223 || Item == 223 && Item2 == 97) { // Restore Potion Finished
		c.addHerb(97, 223, 127, 3739, 22);
	} // Finish Herb Later.
}

}
[/code]
